abstract: Baidu reports second-quarter profit that falls short of analyst expectations; company forecasts revenue in third quarter in range of 18.17 billion renminbi, or $2.93 billion, to 18.58 renminbi.
lead_paragraph: The second-quarter profit for Baidu, China’s biggest Internet search company, fell short of analysts’ estimates as the company spent heavily to diversify away from its core search ad business.

headline.main: Baidu Profit Increases 3.2. Percent, but Below Analysts’ Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Baidu Profit Up 3.2 Percent, but Below Analysts’ Forecasts

snippet: The second-quarter profit for Baidu, China’s biggest Internet search company, fell short of analysts’ estimates as the company spent heavily to diversify away from its core search ad business.
